nodes.text: The Laerdocians were a species who spoke Basic with an unusual accent (pronouncing "nothing" as "nothjing", for example.) A Laerdocian named Bodwae served under the smuggler Booster Terrik as a technician on the Errant Venture circa 19 ABY.
The Essential Atlas Online Companion: K-O, a supplement to The Essential Atlas, mentions a Laerdocia system. This may be the Laerdocian home system.
A "Maerdocian" species is also mentioned in Specter of the Past.
